entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `series` TEXT, `publisher` TEXT, `authors` TEXT, `price` REAL NOT NULL, `periodicity` TEXT, `reserved` INTEGER NOT NULL, `notes` TEXT, `image` TEXT, `lastUpdate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `refJsonId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `removed` INTEGER NOT NULL, `tag` TEXT, `sourceId` TEXT, `selected` INTEGER NOT NULL, `version` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_tComics_name
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_tComics_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`)

indices.name: index_tComics_sourceId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_tComics_sourceId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`sourceId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `comicsId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `number` INTEGER NOT NULL, `date` TEXT, `price` REAL NOT NULL, `purchased` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ordered` INTEGER NOT NULL, `notes` TEXT, `lastUpdate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `removed` INTEGER NOT NULL, `tag` TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(`comicsId`) REFERENCES `tComics`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_tReleases_comicsId_number
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_tReleases_comicsId_number` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`comicsId`, `number`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`sourceId` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `publisher` TEXT NOT NULL, `version` INTEGER NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_tAvailableComics_sourceId
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_tAvailableComics_sourceId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`sourceId`)

indices.name: index_tAvailableComics_name_publisher_version
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_tAvailableComics_name_publisher_version` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`, `publisher`, `version`)

views.createSql: CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT tComics.id as cid, tComics.name as cname, tComics.series as cseries, tComics.publisher as cpublisher, tComics.authors as cauthors, tComics.price as cprice, tComics.periodicity as cperiodicity, tComics.reserved as creserved, tComics.notes as cnotes, tComics.image as cimage, tComics.lastUpdate as clastUpdate, tComics.refJsonId as crefJsonId, tComics.sourceId as csourceId, tComics.selected as cselected, tComics.version as cversion, tReleases.id as rid, tReleases.comicsId as rcomicsId, tReleases.number as rnumber, tReleases.date as rdate, tReleases.price as rprice, tReleases.purchased as rpurchased, tReleases.ordered as rordered, tReleases.notes as rnotes, tReleases.lastUpdate as rlastUpdate, tReleases.tag as rtag FROM tComics INNER JOIN tReleases ON tComics.id = tReleases.comicsId WHERE tComics.removed = 0 AND tReleases.removed = 0 AND tComics.selected = 1

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT
        tComics.id as cid,
        tComics.name as cname,
        tComics.series as cseries,
        tComics.publisher as cpublisher,
        tComics.authors as cauthors,
        tComics.price as cprice,
        tComics.periodicity as cperiodicity,
        tComics.reserved as creserved,
        tComics.notes as cnotes,
        tComics.image as cimage,
        tComics.lastUpdate as clastUpdate,
        tComics.refJsonId as crefJsonId,
        tComics.sourceId as csourceId,
        tComics.selected as cselected,
        tComics.version as cversion,
        tReleases.id as rid,
        tReleases.comicsId as rcomicsId,
        tReleases.number as rnumber,
        tReleases.date as rdate,
        tReleases.price as rprice,
        tReleases.purchased as rpurchased,
        tReleases.ordered as rordered,
        tReleases.notes as rnotes,
        tReleases.lastUpdate as rlastUpdate,
        tReleases.tag as rtag
        FROM tComics INNER JOIN tReleases
        ON tComics.id = tReleases.comicsId
        WHERE tComics.removed = 0 AND tReleases.removed = 0 AND tComics.selected = 1
        AND (date is null or date = '')

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT
        tComics.id as cid,
        tComics.name as cname,
        tComics.series as cseries,
        tComics.publisher as cpublisher,
        tComics.authors as cauthors,
        tComics.price as cprice,
        tComics.periodicity as cperiodicity,
        tComics.reserved as creserved,
        tComics.notes as cnotes,
        tComics.image as cimage,
        tComics.lastUpdate as clastUpdate,
        tComics.refJsonId as crefJsonId,
        tComics.sourceId as csourceId,
        tComics.selected as cselected,
        tComics.version as cversion,
        tReleases.id as rid,
        tReleases.comicsId as rcomicsId,
        tReleases.number as rnumber,
        tReleases.date as rdate,
        tReleases.price as rprice,
        tReleases.purchased as rpurchased,
        tReleases.ordered as rordered,
        tReleases.notes as rnotes,
        tReleases.lastUpdate as rlastUpdate,
        tReleases.tag as rtag
        FROM tComics INNER JOIN tReleases
        ON tComics.id = tReleases.comicsId
        WHERE tComics.removed = 0 AND tReleases.removed = 0 AND tComics.selected = 1
        AND (date is not null and date <> '')

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT
        tComics.id as cid,
        tComics.name as cname,
        tComics.series as cseries,
        tComics.publisher as cpublisher,
        tComics.authors as cauthors,
        tComics.price as cprice,
        tComics.periodicity as cperiodicity,
        tComics.reserved as creserved,
        tComics.notes as cnotes,
        tComics.image as cimage,
        tComics.lastUpdate as clastUpdate,
        tComics.refJsonId as crefJsonId,
        tComics.sourceId as csourceId,
        tComics.selected as cselected,
        tComics.version as cversion,
        tReleases.id as rid,
        tReleases.comicsId as rcomicsId,
        tReleases.number as rnumber,
        tReleases.date as rdate,
        tReleases.price as rprice,
        tReleases.purchased as rpurchased,
        tReleases.ordered as rordered,
        tReleases.notes as rnotes,
        tReleases.lastUpdate as rlastUpdate,
        tReleases.tag as rtag
        FROM tComics INNER JOIN tReleases
        ON tComics.id = tReleases.comicsId
        WHERE tComics.removed = 0 AND tReleases.removed = 0 AND tComics.selected = 1
        AND (date is not null and date <> '')

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT 
        tComics.id as cid, 
        tComics.name as cname, 
        tComics.series as cseries, 
        tComics.publisher as cpublisher, 
        tComics.authors as cauthors, 
        tComics.price as cprice, 
        tComics.periodicity as cperiodicity, 
        tComics.reserved as creserved, 
        tComics.notes as cnotes, 
        tComics.image as cimage, 
        tComics.lastUpdate as clastUpdate, 
        tComics.refJsonId as crefJsonId, 
        tComics.sourceId as csourceId, 
        tComics.selected as cselected, 
        tComics.version as cversion, 
        tReleases.id as rid, 
        tReleases.comicsId as rcomicsId, 
        tReleases.number as rnumber, 
        tReleases.date as rdate, 
        tReleases.price as rprice, 
        tReleases.purchased as rpurchased, 
        tReleases.ordered as rordered, 
        tReleases.notes as rnotes, 
        tReleases.lastUpdate as rlastUpdate, 
        tReleases.tag as rtag 
        FROM tComics INNER JOIN tReleases 
        ON tComics.id = tReleases.comicsId 
        WHERE 
        tComics.removed = 0 
        AND tReleases.removed = 0 
        AND tComics.selected = 1 
        AND purchased = 1

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT
        tComics.id as cid,
        tComics.name as cname,
        tComics.series as cseries,
        tComics.publisher as cpublisher,
        tComics.authors as cauthors,
        tComics.price as cprice,
        tComics.periodicity as cperiodicity,
        tComics.reserved as creserved,
        tComics.notes as cnotes,
        tComics.image as cimage,
        tComics.lastUpdate as clastUpdate,
        tComics.refJsonId as crefJsonId,
        tComics.sourceId as csourceId,
        tComics.selected as cselected,
        tComics.version as cversion,
        tReleases.id as rid,
        tReleases.comicsId as rcomicsId,
        tReleases.number as rnumber,
        tReleases.date as rdate,
        tReleases.price as rprice,
        tReleases.purchased as rpurchased,
        tReleases.ordered as rordered,
        tReleases.notes as rnotes,
        tReleases.lastUpdate as rlastUpdate,
        tReleases.tag as rtag
        FROM tComics INNER JOIN tReleases
        ON tComics.id = tReleases.comicsId
        WHERE tComics.removed = 0 AND tReleases.removed = 0 AND tComics.selected = 1 AND purchased = 0
